title: Flower (South Korean band)
text:
Flower, is a South Korean pop rock band. They were well known for their song "Endless" which became very popular in South Korea.


== Discography ==


=== Album ===
Tears (1999)
Bloom (2000)
Bandlife (2001)
Flower 4th (2005)
Flower Tunes (2010)
